column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////But if you insist on going at meal time
column2: rest assured that your wait time is worth it. Go around the corner to Starbucks and satiate your wait hunger with some plain coffee or iced tea
column3: then suck it up and wait for Lou's. This is a better use of your time and resources than going down the street to Gino's East (because believe me
column6: finding a Giordano's. Lou Malnati's is the only way to go!
